text: George Cooper Stevens (December 18, 1904 â€“ March 8, 1975) was an American movie director, producer, screenwriter and cinematographer.Obituary Variety, March 12, 1975, page 79. His best known works are A Place in the Sun (1951), Shane (1953), Giant (1956), and The Diary of Anne Frank (1959). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:1904 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American cinematographers Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Oakland, California Category:Businesspeople from Oakland, California
title: George Stevens
